# init(x:y:)

**Initializer**

Returns a new sample position on a subpixel grid at specified coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
init(x: Float, y: Float)
```

## Parameters

- **x**: The x coordinate.
- **y**: The y coordinate.
title: init(x:y:)
